title: Black Screen after Champion Select
body: After picking a champion in champ select, and the timer run out, I went into my game and it didn't load. All I got was a black screen, and after about a minute I got this message saying "Unable to connect to the server. If you have a firewall, it may be blocking the connection. Please refer to your firewall's documentation. Would you like to retry the connection?". I have already tried putting down my firewall. This is really annoying because, A) it happened in a ranked game and B) I got leave buster banned. Any help would be much appreciated

replies.body:
Is this still happening for you? If so, what's your ISP and OS?

You might also want to read the [Leaverbuster FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) to avoid possible unnecessary punishments in the future.
